#
# List of files to copy to Public\bin\$(Configuration)
#
# Paths are relative to $(SolutionDir)
# To specify a subfolder destination use "|" followed by the folder name
# Example:
# Stuff\*.xml|XML Stuff
#

# Newtonsoft JSON Parsing
Json45r7\Bin\Net40\Newtonsoft.Json.*

# Unity Dependency Injection
MS Enterprise Library\*.dll

# Google DFP Libraries
dfpapi_dotnet_lib_v4.6.0\lib\*

# Microsoft Http (for simple REST clients)
WCF REST Starter Kit Preview 2\*.dll

# Open SSL (for AppNexus REST client)
openssl-1.0.1c\*.dll

# Stripe CC Billing
Stripe\*.dll

# Unit test mocks
Rhino Mocks\3.6\Rhino.Mocks.*
